blogPost.excerpt: Business chat tools don't cover messaging apps WhatsApp or Telegram conversations. NovoChat makes it easy for businesses to communicate with customers across any messaging app.
blogPost.body: Business chat tools don't cover messaging apps WhatsApp or Telegram conversations. NovoChat makes it easy for businesses to communicate with customers across any messaging app.
blogPost.title: NovoChat - Chat on WhatsApp, Telegram, LINE & more in 1 single place
blogPost.author: Jing Jie Huang

localize.description: 商务聊天工具并不涵盖消息应用WhatsApp或Telegram对话。NovoChat让企业可以轻松地在任何消息应用中与客户沟通。
localize.tagline: 通过WhatsApp、Telegram、LINE以及更多的功能在一个地方聊天。

localize.description: 商務聊天工具並不涵蓋消息應用WhatsApp或Telegram對話。NovoChat讓企業可以輕鬆地在任何消息應用中與客戶溝通。
localize.tagline: 通過WhatsApp、Telegram、LINE以及更多的功能在一個地方聊天。

previous.excerpt: TabFloater improves your productivity by providing a "Picture-in-Picture" functionality, but it's not limited to video - you can use it with any website!
previous.title: TabFloater - Browser extension to use picture-in-picture with any website

localize.description: TabFloater通过提供 "画中画 "功能来提高你的工作效率，但它并不局限于视频--你可以在任何网站上使用它。
localize.tagline: 在任何网站上使用画中画的浏览器扩展。

localize.description: TabFloater通過提供 "畫中畫 "功能來提高你的工作效率，但它並不侷限於視頻--你可以在任何網站上使用它。
localize.tagline: 在任何網站上使用畫中畫的瀏覽器擴展。
